children.string: [A voice against burying the idea of a basic income for Canadians](https://www.thestar.com/opinion/contributors/2021/02/19/a-voice-against-burying-the-idea-of-a-basic-income-for-canadians.html)
Written by:: Hugh SegalContributor, for [[Toronto Star]]

Excerpt:: In some ways, however, the very nature of their sixty-five recommendations for program changes in income security and related programs in B.C. undercuts the anti-basic income orientation of the report itself.

Excerpt:: Ellen Davis suggests that an interpretation of Scripture should be judged by its beauty. She writes, Interpretations of scripture are not just right or wrong, although at times such categories are useful and necessary.
